short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inserts plain-English approximations of fancy IPA-formatted words on English-language Wikipedia and Wiktionary.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows users to learn new words while browsing the world's favorite free encyclopedia or dictionary. For example, /ɪˌpɪstɪˈmɒlədʒi/ is rendered as \ih•p•ih•s•t•ih•M•o•l•uh•j•ee\.
